# CrossXmatch
==================
![](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/73585071/453807589-97440384-c891-4ecb-be2d-34ad671bdf90.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..EYY50CJnbEXrGHZRWRqCEeiLcfDnQA0mzIlBCx_B68I)

@authors Ivan Munoz Rodriguez, Antonis Georgakakis, Angel Ruiz

## Introduction 
This repository contains code to crossmatch X-ray catalogues with other catalogues using astromatch. Current implementation includes get counterparts from optical catalogues and do astrometric corrections.

## Dependencies

The code requires the following packages:

* <a href="http://www.numpy.org/" target="_blank">Numpy</a>

* <a href="http://www.scipy.org/" target="_blank">SciPy</a> 

* <a href="http://pandas.pydata.org/" target="_blank">Pandas</a>

* <a href="http://matplotlib.org/" target="_blank">Matplotlib</a> 

* <a href="https://www.astropy.org/" target="_blank">Astropy</a> 

* <a href="https://cds-astro.github.io/mocpy/" target="_blank">mocpy</a>  

* <a href="https://astroquery.readthedocs.io/en/latest/" target="_blank">astroquery</a>  

* <a href="https://github.com/ruizca/pxsas" target="_blank">pxsas</a> 

* <a href="https://github.com/ruizca/astromatch" target="_blank">astromatch</a>
